January 23, 2025 - Chicago Lighthouse Industries is a Chicago-based nonprofit social enterprise specializing in assembly, packaging, and distribution of high-quality brand name consumer products. Over 75% of its plant workforce are professionals who are legally blind.

April 11, 2025 - On February 2, 2005, The Chicago Lighthouse was featured on the front page of The Wall Street Journal. The article by Michael J. McCarthy covered how the Lighthouse Industries was coping with competition from foreign countries like China.
